mapper.update: UPDATE members m, information i SET userName=#{userName},PASSWORD=#{password},nickName=#{nickName}, playerName=#{information.playerName},sex=#{information.sex}, phoneNumber=#{information.phoneNumber},Email=#{information.email}, sick=#{information.sick},dangerName=#{information.dangerName}, dangerPhone=#{information.dangerPhone},createDATE=NOW() WHERE m.informationId=i.id AND m.id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT m.userName,m.password,m.nickName,m.memberCode, i.id i_id ,i.playerName,i.sex,i.phoneNumber,i.email,i.idNumber,i.sick, i.dangerName,i.dangerPhone,i.createDATE,i.payStatus FROM members m ,information i WHERE m.informationId=i.id AND m.id=#{id}

SELECT m.id,m.userName,m.password,m.nickName,m.memberCode,i.id i_id, i.playerName,i.sex,i.phoneNumber,i.email,i.idNumber,i.sick,i.dangerName,i.dangerPhone,i.createDATE,i.payStatus FROM members m ,information i WHERE m.informationId=i.id ORDER BY createDATE DESC
